Are they exhausted by the consumer equivalent of the brain fatigue—information overload—that is caused by constant updates of devices and online media?As you are probably aware, the latest job markets news isn’t good: Unemployment is still more than 9 percent, and new job growth has fallen close to zero.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均有"或许，大概"之意。
means: maybe ： 普通用词，美国英语多用。指某事也许如此，含不能确定意味。
perhaps ： 普通用词，多用于英国，与maybe同义。
possibly ： 指客观上潜存着发生某种变化的可能。
probably ： 一般指根据逻辑推理，估计有发生的可能，把握性较大，语气比possibly强。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

means.word_mean: 大概; 或许; 可能; 几乎肯定;十之八九

sentences.en: He'll probably find himself in pocket in a good year.
sentences.cn: 年头好时, 他会发现自己赚钱。

sentences.en: Next year I shall probably be looking for a job.
sentences.cn: 明年我很可能找份工作。

sentences.cn: 我们很快要去度假了, 可能是下个月。

sentences.en: I'll ~ be a little late.
sentences.cn: 我可能会稍微晚一点 (到)。</seg>

sentence.cn: 这个男人每周可能花多少时间运动？。
sentence.en: How much time will the man probably spend exercising weekly?
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 听力 题设

entry.def: If you say that something is probably the case, you think that it is likely to be the case, although you are not sure.

example.ex: The White House probably won't make this plan public until July...
example.tran: 白宫可能要等到7月份才会公开这个计划。

example.ex: Van Gogh is probably the best-known painter in the world.
example.tran: 凡·高可能是世界上最知名的画家。

entry.def: You can use probably when you want to make your opinion sound less forceful or definite, so that you do not offend people.
entry.tran: （用于缓和语气）大概，或许，可能

example.ex: He probably thinks you're both crazy!
example.tran: 他可能认为你们两个人都疯了！

means.word_mean: 1. with considerable certainty; without much doubt;

sentences.sentence: "He is probably out of the country"
"in all likelihood we are headed for war"

means.word_mean: 2. easy to believe on the basis of available evidence;

sentences.cn: 你很可能是对的。
sentences.en: You're probably right.

sentences.cn: 这大概没有问题。
sentences.en: It'll probably be OK.

sentences.cn: 这是她最著名的、大概也是她最受欢迎的歌曲。

sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，你或许也会那样回忆某件大事，例如你的婚礼——但是差别在于，由于其他一些心理因素，HSAM者会日复一日地重复这个过程，整个一生都是如此。
sentences.en: In some ways, you probably go through that process after a big event like your wedding day – but the difference is that thanks to their other psychological tendencies, the HSAM subjects are doing it day in, day out, for the whole of their lives.

sentences.en: So, if you require very high performance, static languages are probably a safer choice.

sentences.cn: 我或许可以自己介绍他们.
sentences.en: I could probably introduce them myself.

sentences.cn: 他们或许用心是好的.

sentences.en: If you have already had the disease, probably you won't catch it again.

sentences.en: Anyway, he's probably glad to leave that noisy building.

Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: You probably think college students are experts at sleeping, but parties, preparations for tests, personal problems and general stress can wreck a student's sleep habits, which can be bad for the body and the mind.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section A
